briefdescription.para: OpenGL target.
Direct3D11 shader resource view.
Direct3D11 sampler state object.
Direct3D11 resolve texture object when multisample with autoresolve is used.
Texture format.
Texture usage type.
Current mip levels.
Requested mip levels.
Texture width.
Texture height.
Texture depth.
Shadow compare mode.
Filtering mode.
Addressing mode.
Texture anisotropy level.
Mip levels to skip when loading per texture quality setting.
Border color.
Multisampling level.
sRGB sampling and writing mode flag.
Parameters dirty flag.
Multisampling autoresolve flag.

Mipmap levels regeneration needed -flag.
Backup texture.
Construct.
Destruct.
Set number of requested mip levels. Needs to be called before setting size.

detaileddescription.para: The default value (0) allocates as many mip levels as necessary to reach 1x1 size. Set value 1 to disable mipmapping. Note that rendertargets need to regenerate mips dynamically after rendering, which may cost performance. Screen buffers and shadow maps allocated by Renderer will have mipmaps disabled.
Set filtering mode. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set addressing mode by texture coordinate. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set texture max. anisotropy level. No effect if not using anisotropic filtering. Value 0 (default) uses the default setting from Renderer. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Set shadow compare mode. Not used on Direct3D9.

detaileddescription.para: Set border color for border addressing mode. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set sRGB sampling and writing mode. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set backup texture to use when rendering to this texture. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Set mip levels to skip on a quality setting when loading. Ensures higher quality levels do not skip more. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return API-specific texture format. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether the texture format is compressed. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return number of mip levels. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return width. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return height. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return depth.

detaileddescription.para: Return filtering mode. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return addressing mode by texture coordinate. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return texture max. anisotropy level. Value 0 means to use the default value from Renderer. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return whether shadow compare is enabled. Not used on Direct3D9.

detaileddescription.para: Return border color. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether is using sRGB sampling and writing. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return texture multisampling level (1 = no multisampling). BIND_AS_PROPERTY

Return texture multisampling autoresolve mode. When true, the texture is resolved before being sampled on SetTexture(). When false, the texture will not be resolved and must be read as individual samples in the shader. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether multisampled texture needs resolve. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return whether rendertarget mipmap levels need regenration. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return backup texture. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return mip levels to skip on a quality setting when loading. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return mip level width, or 0 if level does not exist. BIND_AS_PROPERTY
Return mip level width, or 0 if level does not exist. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return mip level depth, or 0 if level does not exist.

detaileddescription.para: Return texture usage type. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return data size in bytes for a rectangular region.

memberdef.argsstring: (int width, int height, int depth) const
memberdef.name: GetDataSize

briefdescription.para: Return data size in bytes for a volume region.
Return data size in bytes for a pixel or block row.

detaileddescription.para: Return number of image components required to receive pixel data from GetData(), or 0 for compressed images. BIND_AS_PROPERTY

briefdescription.para: Return whether the parameters are dirty.
Set additional parameters from an XML file.
Set additional parameters from an XML element.
Mark parameters dirty. Called by Graphics.
Update dirty parameters to the texture object. Called by Graphics when assigning the texture.
Return shader resource view. Only used on Direct3D11.
Return sampler state object. Only used on Direct3D11.
Return resolve texture. Only used on Direct3D11.
Return texture's target. Only used on OpenGL.

detaileddescription.para: Convert format to sRGB. Not used on Direct3D9. NO_BIND

briefdescription.para: Set or clear the need resolve flag. Called internally by Graphics.
Set the mipmap levels dirty flag. Called internally by Graphics.
Regenerate mipmap levels for a rendertarget after rendering and before sampling. Called internally by Graphics. No-op on Direct3D9. On OpenGL the texture must have been bound to work properly.
Check maximum allowed mip levels for a specific texture size.

memberdef.argsstring: (int width, int height, int depth, unsigned requestedLevels)
memberdef.name: CheckMaxLevels

briefdescription.para: Check maximum allowed mip levels for a specific 3D texture size.

detaileddescription.para: Return the shader resource view format corresponding to a texture format. Handles conversion of typeless depth texture formats. Only used on Direct3D11. NO_BIND
Return the depth-stencil view format corresponding to a texture format. Handles conversion of typeless depth texture formats. Only used on Direct3D11. NO_BIND
Return the non-internal texture format corresponding to an OpenGL internal format. NO_BIND
Return the data type corresponding to an OpenGL internal format. NO_BIND

briefdescription.para: Check whether texture memory budget has been exceeded. Free unused materials in that case to release the texture references.
Create the GPU texture. Implemented in subclasses.
Base class for texture resources.
